details.name: Density (±0.05 kg/L)
details.info:
Flat: 1.35 kg/L
Semi-Gloss: 1.20 kg/L
Gloss: 1.12 kg/L

details.name: Theoretical Coverage
details.info:
Plain finish: 25-30 sq. m. 
Textured finish: 15-18 sq. m.
* per 4-Liters at 2.0-1.5 mils DFT

details.name: Tinting
details.info: Use Acrytex Tinting Colors at a ratio of 1:16, colorant to paint

details.name: Thinning Solvent
details.info: BOYSEN®® Acrytex™ Reducer B‑1750 *If using brush or roller, use approximately 1-Liter of Acrytex Reducer B‑1750 per 4-Liter of Acrytex paint.
